Hello!

I'm Aaska, a programmer, developer, technophile.

I am a third year undergrad studying ICT at DA-IICT,India. Currently I am an intern at Robocop.io. I am a web developer, android developer, tech geek loving competitive programming and contributing to opensource. Exploring and painting are what interests me apart from computers and technology. I am the one always looking for new challenges and ready for learning something new.
